summary: This bill, the "Opposing the Cultivation and Trade of Octopus Produced through Unethical Strategies Act of 2025" (OCTOPUS Act of 2025), aims to prohibit commercial octopus aquaculture in the United States, its exclusive economic zone, and its waters. It prevents the authorization of such farms by the Secretaries of Commerce and Interior, and bans the importation and re-export of commercially farmed octopus. The bill includes exceptions for octopus used for public display, breeding programs, and research. It also mandates reporting of harvest methods for imported octopus. Violators of the import/re-export ban will be subject to a civil penalty.
